Package net.floodlightcontroller.core.web.serializers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteArrayMACSerializer
    Serialize a MAC as colon-separated hexadecimal
    DPIDSerializer
    Serialize a DPID as colon-separated hexadecimal
    IOFSwitchSerializer
    Serialize a IOFSwitch for more readable information
    IPv4Serializer
    Serialize an IPv4Address in dotted decimal format
    IPv6Serializer
    Serialize an IPv6Address in dotted decimal format
    JsonObjectWrapperSerializer
    Serialize a NodePortTupleSerializer
    MacSerializer
    Serialize a MAC as colon-separated hexadecimal
    MatchSerializer
    Serialize any Match in JSON.
    NodePortTupleSerializer
    Serialize a NodePortTupleSerializer
    OFActionListSerializer
    Serialize any List of OFAction in JSON.
    OFFlowModSerializer
    Serialize any OFFlowMod in JSON.
    OFGroupModSerializer
    Serialize any OFGroupMod in JSON.
    OFInstructionListSerializer
    Serialize any List of OFInstruction in JSON.
    OFPortSerializer
    Serialize a OFPort as short number
    StatsReplySerializer
    Serialize any OFStatsReply or OFFeaturesReply in JSON wrapped by a StatsReply object.
    UShortSerializer
    Serialize a short value as an unsigned short
    VlanVidSerializer
    Serialize a VlanVid as short number
